name: Heartbeat Dungeon
description:
You are a dungeon raider, every kill and every hit excites you.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Shift to Slide.

LMB to shoot.

Comment:

This is another tiny game with the intent to test my skills. The project done by me solo and the goal is to learning and practice game development. Although not very complete compare to "Untitled Run Gun", I still decide to put it out there as a marker to show my progress.

Attributions:

Music: 

  • “The Foyer”, from PlayOnLoop.com

Art:

  • 16x16 DungeonTileset II + pixeldudesmaker by 0x72
  • The Ultimate Weapons Pack by Jestan
  • SMOKE-PARTICLE by pedroricciotti
  • 1-bit button icons by ansdor

SFX:

  • Boss Death sound by ludist
  • Player Hurt Sound by TunePicket
  • Revolver Fire by dcsimon
